Summary: bluish/green long streamer like copper burning flame, missle like shape
divs: sighting detailsi was looking to the west after sunset because i had taken some pictures of the sunset then took the camera in and sat it down. since it was so warm that evening i decided to sit on the front pourch and cool down some and looking to the west at about 10-o-clock high i see this fairly big object coming down really fast then all of a sudden it lit up in this long bluish\green color and got bright fo about 15 seconds then just dissapered. i don't think it was going fast enough to burn up as i've seen meteors shoot by up high and at shallow angles but this was about 10 degrees off being stright down. i know you are probably thinking that it might be fireworks or something like that but i know the difference and this wasen't that.it was close enough that i would have herd the launch in the form of a boom. i look up at the night sky alot not looking for strange things but to look at the stars because i'm a star gaser. i have a telescope which ocassionally use and it's quite powerfull. i can inlarge the moon to 400 times with a filter and see hills and stratta lawers as well as the rugged peaks around the craters. the altitude where i first see it was probably around 2500 feet and dissapered at 7 or 800 feet absoulty no noise what so ever. this is the first time i've ever seen anything like it. i hjave never seen a ufo i couldn't identify as being an air craft or some other type of object such as clouds or baloon's or inversion layers which can cause a mirage. it didn't scare me or anything it got me to thinking that what happened to it?
trends: There have been 30 other sightings in McKinney
There were no other sightings in McKinney on or around July 20th 2008
